roleset.name: anti-affection
roleset.note: DESPISE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'despise' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class despise 31.2, no mention of other members. Comparison to 'like'. (from despise.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive, gnarly trace chains
example.text: The speed with which such program trades take place and the volatile price movements they can cause are what [program trading critics]-1 profess *trace*-1 to despise *trace*.
example.arg: what -> The speed with which such program trades take place and the volatile price movements they can cause
